display_html:
data OpenAPIErr
  • = InvalidInfo InfoErr
  • | InvalidPath PathErr
  • | NoPaths
  • | RepPaths
  • | InvalidServer ServerErr
name: OpenAPIErr InvalidServer RepPaths NoPaths InvalidPath InvalidInfo

display_html:
data InfoErr
  • = InvalidTitle
  • | InvalidDescriptionI
  • | InvalidToS
  • | InvalidContact ContactErr
  • | InvalidLicense LicenseErr
  • | InvalidVersion
  • | NoInfo
name: InfoErr NoInfo InvalidVersion InvalidLicense InvalidContact InvalidToS InvalidDescriptionI InvalidTitle
PathErr RepResponses NoOperations InvalidOperation InvalidDescriptionP InvalidSummaryP InvalidNameP
OperationErr MoreThanOneDefault InvalidResponse NoResponses InvalidType InvalidDescriptionO InvalidSummaryO InvalidTags

display_html:
data OpenAPI = OpenAPI {
  • _openAPI :: Text
  • _openInfo :: Info
  • _openPaths :: [Path]
  • _openServers :: [Server]
}
name: OpenAPI OpenAPI _openServers _openPaths _openInfo _openAPI

display_html:
data Info = Info {
  • _infoTitle :: Text
  • _infoDescription :: Maybe Text
  • _infoTermsOfService :: Maybe Text
  • _infoContact :: Maybe Contact
  • _infoLicense :: Maybe License
  • _infoVersion :: Text
}
name: Info Info _infoVersion _infoLicense _infoContact _infoTermsOfService _infoDescription _infoTitle

display_html:
data Path = Path {
  • _pathName :: Text
  • _pathSummary :: Maybe Text
  • _pathDescription :: Maybe Text
  • _pathOperations :: [Operation]
}
name: Path Path _pathOperations _pathDescription _pathSummary _pathName

display_html:
data Operation = Operation {
  • _operationType :: OperationType
  • _operationTags :: Maybe [Text]
  • _operationSummary :: Maybe Text
  • _operationDescription :: Maybe Text
  • _operationResponses :: [Responses]
}
name: Operation Operation _operationResponses _operationDescription _operationSummary _operationTags _operationType

display_html:
data Responses
  • = Default Response
  • | Status Text Response
name: Responses Status Default

display_html:
data OperationType
  • = GET
  • | POST
  • | PUT
  • | DELETE
  • | OPTIONS
  • | HEAD
  • | PATCH
  • | TRACE
name: OperationType TRACE PATCH HEAD OPTIONS DELETE PUT POST GET

display_html:
data Contact = Contact {
  • _contactName :: Maybe Text
  • _contactUrl :: Maybe Text
  • _contactEmail :: Maybe Text
}
name: Contact Contact _contactEmail _contactUrl _contactName

display_html:
data License = License {
  • _licenseName :: Text
  • _licenseUrl :: Maybe Text
}
name: License License _licenseUrl _licenseName

display_html:
data Server = Server {
  • _serverURL :: Text
  • _serverDescription :: Maybe Text
  • _serverVars :: HashMap Text ServerVar
}
name: Server Server _serverVars _serverDescription _serverURL

display_html:
data ServerVar = ServerVar {
  • _serverVEnum :: Maybe [Text]
  • _serverVDefault :: Text
  • _serverVDescription :: Maybe Text
}
name: ServerVar ServerVar _serverVDescription _serverVDefault _serverVEnum

display_html: openServers :: Lens' OpenAPI [Server]
name: openServers

display_html: openPaths :: Lens' OpenAPI [Path]
name: openPaths

display_html: openInfo :: Lens' OpenAPI Info
name: openInfo

display_html: infoLicense :: Lens' Info (Maybe License)
name: infoLicense

display_html: infoContact :: Lens' Info (Maybe Contact)
name: infoContact

display_html: pathSummary :: Lens' Path (Maybe Text)
name: pathSummary

display_html: operationType :: Lens' Operation OperationType
name: operationType

display_html: operationTags :: Lens' Operation (Maybe [Text])
name: operationTags

display_html: contactUrl :: Lens' Contact (Maybe Text)
name: contactUrl

display_html: contactName :: Lens' Contact (Maybe Text)
name: contactName

display_html: contactEmail :: Lens' Contact (Maybe Text)
name: contactEmail

display_html: licenseUrl :: Lens' License (Maybe Text)
name: licenseUrl

display_html: serverVEnum :: Lens' ServerVar (Maybe [Text])
name: serverVEnum

display_html: pairMaybes :: (ToJSON a, KeyValue b) => [Maybe a] -> [Text] -> [b]
name: pairMaybes

display_html: foldBuilder :: Traversable t => (b -> c) -> (t a -> d) -> t (Either b a) -> Either c d
name: foldBuilder

display_html: noRepRecord :: (Ord a, Eq b) => (t -> [b]) -> (b -> a) -> c -> t -> Either c t
name: noRepRecord

display_html: apIfRight :: Traversable t => c -> (t a -> c) -> t (Either b a) -> c
name: apIfRight

display_html: maybeRight :: Maybe (Either b a) -> Maybe a
name: maybeRight

display_html: allDifferent :: (Ord a, Eq a, Eq b) => (b -> a) -> [b] -> Bool
name: allDifferent

display_html: cond :: (b -> Bool) -> (b -> c) -> (b -> c) -> b -> c
name: cond

display_html: configServer :: ServerBuilder -> Either ServerErr Server
name: configServer

display_html: varServer :: Text -> Either ServerVarErr ServerVar -> ServerBuilder
name: varServer

display_html: configPath :: PathBuilder -> Either PathErr Path
name: configPath

display_html: operationPath :: Either OperationErr Operation -> PathBuilder
name: operationPath

display_html: statusResponseOperation :: Text -> Either ResponseErr Response -> OperationBuilder
name: statusResponseOperation

display_html: config :: State OpenAPIB () -> Either OpenAPIErr OpenAPI
name: config

display_html: infoOpenAPI :: Either InfoErr Info -> OpenAPIBuilder
name: infoOpenAPI

display_html: pathOpenAPI :: Either PathErr Path -> OpenAPIBuilder
name: pathOpenAPI

display_html: serverOpenAPI :: Either ServerErr Server -> OpenAPIBuilder
name: serverOpenAPI

display_html: configLicense :: LicenseBuilder -> Either LicenseErr License
name: configLicense

display_html: configInfo :: InfoBuilder -> Either InfoErr Info
name: configInfo

display_html: contactInfo :: Either ContactErr Contact -> InfoBuilder
name: contactInfo

display_html: licenseInfo :: Either LicenseErr License -> InfoBuilder
name: licenseInfo

display_html: configContact :: ContactBuilder -> Either ContactErr Contact
name: configContact

display_html: dumpConfig :: FilePath -> Either OpenAPIErr OpenAPI -> IO ()
name: dumpConfig
